0: It was a melodrama filmed entirely in a Burbank Ikea store, without the store knowing!  Pretty wild,. You could be an employee at Ikea and not even know you are a TV star!
wow, that is very different. do you like dogs?
I love dogs. I have a GSD.  Did you know a dog can learn over 1000 words?
that is remarkable. and they understand pointing

6: Nice, I never knew that the Cadillac car was named after Antoine de la Mothe Cadillac

Nice, hope the trunks aren't made of wood in South Africa, they can mount flame throwers on their car
scary.  There was a race car driver who became professional by beating 90,000 people in a video game gran turismo
